meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Janet Weymouth Mark Winburne Sharon Miyasato Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #547.

td.p: Janet Weymouth, a professional mother from Newport News, Virginia
Mark Winburne, a copywriter from Memphis, Tennessee
Sharon Miyasato, an attorney from Oakland, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,999)

tr.td: TECHNOLOGY
POTENT POTABLES
CELEBRITY SECRETS
EASY OPERA
SPORTS TRIVIA
ACCORDING TO SPOCK
